verbose_text: microRNA (miR) -222 was predicted to target B-cell lymphoma-2 (Bcl-2) binding component 3 (BBC3, also known as p53 upregulated modulator of apoptosis) by a bioinformatics analysis with TargetScan, which was verified by a dual-luciferase reporter assay system.
evidence: BBC3, also known as p53 upregulated modulator of apoptosis
